show_name: Dragon Ball Movie 4: The Path to Power
other_title: Bola de Drac: El Camí cap a el més fort
Dragon Ball - O caminho do poder (Portuguese)
Dragon Ball The Movie - Il cammino dell'eroe (Italian)
Dragon Ball The Movies: The Way to the Strongest
Dragon Ball: El camino hacia el más fuerte (Spanish)
Dragon Ball: L'Armée du ruban rouge (French)
Dragon Ball: La nascita degli eroi (Italian)
Dragon Ball: Saikyou e no Michi (Japanese)
ドラゴンボール 最強への道 (Japanese)
七龍珠 邁向最強之路 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: A retelling of Dragon Ball's origin with a different take on the meeting of Goku, Bulma, and Kame-Sen'nin. It also retells the Red Ribbon Army story; but this time they find Goku rather than Goku finding them.
ending_theme: "DAN DAN Kokoro Hikarete ku" by Field of View
